title: How to Really Improve in League of Legends
body:
Hello my friendly summoners, how are you all doing? I am hereby trying to promote my relatively new youtube channel all about getting people out of bronze and silver! I will teach you how to really improve at this game by understanding all there is to know about the basics, intermediate and advanced skills of the game like, warding, kiting, power spikes, jungle control etc.! I would really like to hear your thoughts about my channel and my videos!

Peace :)

replies.body: Hey man, I enjoyed this video. Definitely going to watch some more
PS: Any type of critic will be well accepted!
I like your video so far and I've subscribed :)

Very interesting and professional, I like how you compared League to Pokémon, they definitely are very similar hey? Like every champion is an individual Pokémon which you have to train and level up. Overall good job keep it up!
